name: Juvenile Flight
summary: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.
description:
You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled. If you have Fledgling Flight, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.Juvenile Flight Leads To...

Fully FlightedTraitsStrix: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
